summary: An ordinance appropriating and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to purchase $6,000.00 Chelan County General Obligation 5 and 1/2 % Bonds, due October 1, 1929 at $103.28, and accrued interest, and $2,000.00 Chelan County, Washington, 5 and 1/2 % General Obligation Bonds, due October 1, 1930 at $104.10, and accrued interest, and appropriating $6,400.00 or so as much thereof as may be necessary from the Water Bonds Sinking Fund.
